content: This is bad enough already, but she also has an attack where she shoots spores out over the arena that target and hurt you. These spores replenish the Fungiwoman's health. The trick here is to fight aggressively so she doesn't have time to replenish much HP. Otherwise, it can drag on for a very long time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiwoman_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiwoman Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Fungiwoman Fight'.
The content is as follows:
This is bad enough already, but she also has an attack where she shoots spores out over the arena that target and hurt you. These spores replenish the Fungiwoman's health. The trick here is to fight aggressively so she doesn't have time to replenish much HP. Otherwise, it can drag on for a very long time.
